titleInfo.title: 'File 36/38 Congratulatory Messages re. Allies' Successes in War'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 94; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 2-86; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: This file contains letters and telegrams sent to the Political Agency in Bahrain from individuals, primarily members of the region's ruling families, as well as from a number of Bahraini institutions.The main correspondents in the file are the Political Agency, the ruler of Sharjah, Shaikh Sultan bin Saqr Al Qasimi; and the ruler of Bahrain, Shaikh Salmān bin Ḥamad Āl Khalīfah.The letters are primarily messages of congratulations related to victories on behalf of Britain and its allies in the Second World War that took place between 1943 and 1945.The file also contains copies of the responses (including drafts) that were sent back from the Political Agency to these various individuals and institutions.The majority of the letters are in Arabic (with English translations provided).
